// Pivot 0, 0
int wheel0[32] = {
	2, 0,
	15, 22,
	21, 22,
	24, 27,
	51, 27,
	51, 30,
	25, 30,
	22, 34,
	16, 35,
	2, 57,
	0, 56,
	13, 34,
	11, 29,
	13, 24,
	0, 1,
	1, 0
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
